fields.title: Outside Cave Entrance
fields.description: North of you, the cave mount beckons

fields.title: Grand Overlook
fields.description:
A steep cliff appears before you, falling
into the darkness. Ahead to the north, a light flickers in
the distance, but there is no way across the chasm.

fields.title: Foyer
fields.description: Dim light filters in from the south.

fields.title: Narrow Passage
fields.description:
The narrow passage bends here from west
to north. The smell of gold permeates the air.

fields.title: Treasure Chamber
fields.description:
You've found the long-lost treasure
chamber! Sadly, it has already been completely emptied by
earlier adventurers. The only exit is to the south.
